spells.name: Acidic Spray
spells.description: 1d6/level acid damage plus 1 round of acid.

spells.name: Astral Projection, Lesser
spells.description: Limited astral travel.

spells.name: Corrosive Consumption
spells.description: Acidic patch damages an opponent.

spells.name: Curse of Disgust
spells.description: Target is sickened when viewing a trigger.

spells.name: Echolocation
spells.description: Sonic sense gives you blindsight 40 ft.

spells.name: Fickle Winds
spells.description: Wind walls selectively block attacks.

spells.name: Icy Prison
spells.description: Thick ice holds and damages the target.

spells.name: Lightning Arc
spells.description: Targets in a line take 1d6 electricity/level.

spells.name: Monstrous Physique III
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Diminutive or Huge monstrous humanoid.

spells.name: Plague Carrier
spells.description: Target's attacks carry filth fever.

spells.name: Possess Object
spells.description: Possess and animate one object.

spells.name: Rapid Repair
spells.description: Construct gains fast healing 5.

spells.name: Smug Narcissism
spells.description: Target is distracted by its sense of self.

spells.name: Sonic Thrust
spells.description: Sound moves targets away from you.

spells.name: Soothe Construct
spells.description: Reduce the berserk chance of a construct.

spells.name: Symbol of Scrying
spells.description: Triggered rune activates scrying sensor.

spells.name: Unbreakable Construct
spells.description: Increase construct hardness or DR.

spells.name: Undead Anatomy II
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large undead.

spells.name: Vermin Shape II
spells.description: As vermin shape, but Tiny or Large.

spells.name: Wall of Sound
spells.description: Sonic wall deflects and damages creatures.
